content: You don't have to spend years in art school to become an in-demand designer. With MidJourney, you can start creating stunning images right now.
When I first started, I was amazed at how quickly I could create professional-grade artwork. I can't wait for you to experience the same!
Many people already do so! They make illustrations for social networks and custom characters and even sell their artwork online. The possibilities are endless.
But to start earning with AI, you need to understand how it works - that is, to master prompt engineering.

Don't worry. In this course, I will teach you all the secrets of MidJourney. You will be able to create images, portraits, blog pictures and arts like a pro! â†’ You can create images, portraits, blog pictures, and art like a pro!
Before we start, you need to know that prompt engineering is the key to unlocking MidJourney's full potential. A well-crafted prompt can make all the difference in generating the perfect image.

Every prompt at MidJourney starts with commands, for example, - /imagine.

We will further explore other commands, but for now, let's start with the basics.

title: Your First Prompt for MidJourney
instruction: Fill in the gap to complete a simple prompt.

content:
Well done, you have just created your first AI art!

As you can see, MidJourney creates 4 different images for your prompt. So you can choose one and fine tune it further.
As you get more comfortable with MidJourney, you'll learn to write more complex prompts and fine-tune them for even better results.

Here are some tips for the future:
1. Be specific: The more detail you provide, the closer the result will be to your vision.

2. Experiment: Try different styles and subjects to see what works best.

3. Refine: If the first result isn't perfect, tweak your prompt and try again.

Great! You've now got a quick start guide to using MidJourney and the basics of prompt engineering.

Remember, every great designer started somewhere, and you're already on your way!
In the next lesson, we'll start creating your first AI art together and practice making prompts. Stay curious!
